name: Free
description: Perfect for individuals or small teams just getting started. The Free Plan offers essential features to get you up and running without any cost.

name: Basic
description: Ideal for growing teams and small businesses. The Basic Plan provides enhanced capabilities and support to help you manage your tasks more efficiently.

name: Pro
description: Designed for larger teams and organizations needing more advanced tools and greater support. The Pro Plan offers comprehensive features to streamline your workflow.

name: Ultimate
description: Perfect for enterprises and large organizations. The Ultimate Plan offers the most extensive set of features and personalized support to maximize productivity and efficiency.
